name: Purr-fect Crimes
description:
Are you ready to commit the Purr-fect crime?

In Purr-fect Crimes, you'll manage and build an army of feral cats to help you take over the world, eventually! Send your cat burglars into empty houses and buildings to salvage enough food to recruit more felines into your army and collect priceless gems for training upgrades for your multitude of maniacal meowers.

Ready Set Pounce:

Jamie LaRose - Creative Director
William Beatty - Technical Designer
Kevin Davis - Systems Programmer
David Linaburg - AI Programmer
Charles Price -  Character Artist

How to install:

1. Download the .apk file on your smartphone.

2. Install the game.

3. Tap on the icon to run the game.

4. Enjoy and tell us what you think!
